file_content.text: It has been an honor to fight at your side. May the Force be with you.
In the end, Darth Angral got the war he wanted. Let's hope he doesn't get the victory, too.
Sometimes, I see a light of recognition in a Sith's eyes, right before I kill him. It can be... unsettling.
Our enemy attacks women and children. They've abandoned all sense of honor.
I will sacrifice my life if it means defeating the Empire. Its evil ends on Corellia.
I hoped we'd meet again. You changed my life on Tatooine, and I never had the chance to thank you.
Look at you, Lord Praven. Pretending to be a Jedi.
I heard the Emperor's Wrath travels with you. Will he become a Jedi, too?
He's more difficult to persuade than you, but I won't give up.
That remains to be seen.
The dark side is empty, Scourge. You won't miss it.
Darkness holds more than either of you realize.
I didn't realize you'd passed your trials. It doesn't seem that long since our duel.
You're a Jedi, now?
I'm still only a Padawan, but the Jedi path has come easily for me.
Naturally. You're soft.
He's more useful to me like this.
I wouldn't want him to.
What use could a Sith be to a Jedi?
Ask yourself that same question.
The Empire sent these droids to crush Corellia's resistance fighters. When I learned of the attack, I came to save these people.
It's a strange thing, saving lives instead of taking them. But it feels right. I'm stronger than I've ever been.
We're going to save this entire planet. Are you strong enough for that?
We'll need that strength.
Adding my strength to yours will be a great honor.
You've come a long way since the last time I saw you, Lord Praven.
I'm proud of you.
Just Praven. That title doesn't hold meaning for me, anymore.
I can't believe Master Satele thought sending a former Sith to this war zone was a good idea.
The Council trusted you here?
The Jedi are my people now.
Master Satele named me supreme commander of Jedi forces. Rendezvous with our reinforcements at these coordinates right away.
Understood. I will see you there.
I serve the Republic and the Jedi Order. I will protect you until my dying breath.
Turn away from the dark side!
The Emperor has lied to you!
The dark side's path ends in death!
True strength comes from the light!
If you have any honor, you will surrender!
Your attacks are useless against me!
The Jedi way is superior!
Don't make me destroy you!
